original_text: And Laban said, This heap is a witness between me and thee this day. Therefore was the name of it called Galeed;
korean_text: 라반의 말에 오늘 이 무더기가 너와 나 사이에 증거가 된다 하였으므로 그 이름을 갈르엣이라 불렀으며

sentences.original_text: This heap is a witness between me and thee
sentences.korean_translation: 이 돌무더기는 나와 너 사이의 증거가 되리라

sentences.original_text: Therefore was the name of it called Galeed
